ygData.subject: Re: Big races
ygData.msgSnippet: Obviously, there may be a differance in tank power between the 2 races, but, it is not all that impressive, if it is even there. Seems like no one else
ygData.messageBody:
Obviously, there may be a differance in "tank power" between the 2 races, but, it is not all that impressive, if it is even there. Seems like no one else notices a big differance either.
----- Original Message -----
From: Wilson, ThomasX B
To: 'shadowknight@onelist.com'
Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 10:02 AM
Subject: RE: [shadowknight] Big races


Something that has to be considered though is how much damage does said Troll also take (AGI and/or Dex) and what is the actual average damage. Max damage is nice but in the overal picture if the two SK's were to fight the exact same mob (and if we were able to eliminate the randomness involved), how would the fight end. Would the Troll do more damage and end the fight quicker but in the process also take more damage than said DE SK..

Any ideas?
